org.apache.karaf.scheduler.core

Class QuartzScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.scheduler.core.QuartzScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scheduler

    public class QuartzScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scheduler
    The quartz based implementation of the scheduler.

                           long period)
        Description copied from interface: Scheduler
        Create a schedule options to fire a job immediately more than once.
        Specified by:
        NOW in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        times - The number of times this job should be started (must be higher than 1 or -1 for endless).
        period - Every period seconds this job is started (must be at higher than 0).
        Returns:
        The corresponding ScheduleOptions.
        See Also:
        Scheduler.NOW(int, long)

                          long period)

        Create a schedule options to fire a job period starting at a specific date.
        Specified by:
        AT in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        date - The date this job should be run.

      • schedule

        public void schedule(java.lang.Object job,
                     ScheduleOptions options)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     SchedulerError
        Schedule a job
        Specified by:
        schedule in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        job - The job to execute (either Job or Runnable).
        options - Required options defining how to schedule the job.
        Throws:
        SchedulerError - if the job can't be scheduled
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the preconditions are not met
        See Also:
        Scheduler.schedule(java.lang.Object, org.apache.karaf.scheduler.ScheduleOptions)
